title: (x) Monocle magazine nameplate - Plantin {Loremipsum}
content:
Great Magazine with great typography. I am trying to figure out what this font is. Any guesses? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042840im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/monocle_logo_w_b_5319.gif)

 [‹ (x) OpenMoko headline sans - Sansa {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042840/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39630 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "L&D" very bold soft serif face - Goudy Heavyface {Loremipsum} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042840/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39624 "Go to next forum topic")
author: peopleandbears

comments.content: Thanks! Any recommendations for a similar style but maybe an updated version?

[Mon Oncle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042840/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mon_Oncle)

... the style is a little different, though ...

—  
Could you tell a bit more about which kind of “updated” you’re looking for?

“Any recommendations for a similar style but maybe an updated version?”

Musee  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/musee/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828042840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/musee/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/musee/")
